item.title: First Post! Hello World!
item.description: This was a long time coming. I have always wanted a sleek styled personal webpage! Currently it is a pretty basic setup, hugo with Introduction template hosted on github pages. However! I plan on doing some more fancy backend things to support this, some of these plans include having a drone pipeline setup to push stuff from my personal gitea repos straight to production (scary) and maybe some more build like things that allow me to handle some of the mundane maintenance tasks.
